title: MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage | Awesome Arcade Hamster Home (White) | 18.11 x 11.61 x 21.26 Inch
descriptions:
**MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage | Awesome Arcade Hamster Home (White)**

Transform your furry friend's living space with the MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage - the Awesome Arcade Hamster Home, where comfort meets fun in a stylish white design. This meticulously crafted hamster habitat is designed to provide your pet with an exciting and enriching environment.

**Product Features:**
- **Spacious Multi-Level Play Space:** With dimensions of 18.11 inches in length, 11.61 inches in width, and 21.26 inches in height, this cage offers ample room for exploration.
- **Lightweight and Durable:** Weighing just 6.1 pounds, the cage is easy to relocate yet robust enough to ensure safety.
- **Elegant White Color:** A clean, white aesthetic that complements any home decor.
- **Deep Base for Bedding:** A thoughtful design feature that allows for a generous layer of bedding to encourage natural burrowing behavior.
- **Easy Access and Maintenance:** Equipped with a top door for hassle-free access and a removable upper cover for simple cleaning.
- **Modular Design:** Customize and expand your pet's home with connector pieces and compatibility with standard play tubes.
- **No-Tools Assembly:** Set up your hamster's new home with ease, as no tools are required for assembly.

**Included Accessories:**
- **Exercise Wheel:** Keep your hamster fit and entertained with a built-in exercise wheel.
- **Water Bottle:** A leak-proof water bottle to keep your pet hydrated.
- **Food Bowl:** An easily accessible food bowl for meal times.
- **Nesting Nook:** A cozy space for your hamster to rest and enjoy some privacy.
- **Interior Play Tubes:** Fun and engaging play tubes for your pet to scurry through.

**Warranty and Assurance:**
- **Peace of Mind:** Comes with a 1-year Manufacturer's Warranty, ensuring your pet's home stands the test of time.

Whether it's playtime or downtime, the Awesome Arcade Hamster Home by MidWest Homes for Pets offers everything your hamster needs to live a happy and active life. Indulge your little companion with a cage that's not just a home, but a playground!

**MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage | Awesome Arcade Hamster Home (White)**

Introduce your furry little friend to a world of luxury and fun with the MidWest Homes for Pets Awesome Arcade Hamster Home! This brilliantly designed white hamster cage is more than just a home—it's an interactive playground tailored for the endless energy and curiosity of your hamster.

**Key Features:**

- **Spacious Dimensions**: Measuring 18.11 inches in length, 11.61 inches in width, and 21.26 inches in height, this cage offers ample space for your hamster to explore and stay active.
- **Lightweight and Sturdy**: With a weight of only 6.1 pounds, this cage is easy to move and position in your home while offering a reliable structure for your pet's safety and comfort.
- **Multi-Level Play Space**: The multi-level design allows your hamster to scamper up, down, and all around their personal play area.
- **Deep Base for Bedding**: A deep base ensures that your pet has plenty of bedding material to burrow into, keeping them happy and entertained.
- **Easy Access and Cleaning**: Equipped with a top door for easy access, a removable upper cover, and a modular design, maintaining and interacting with your pet is a breeze.
- **Standard Play Tube Compatibility**: Comes with connector pieces that are compatible with standard play tubes, making it easy to expand or customize the cage with accessories.
- **Full Accessory Set**: Includes all the essentials—exercise wheel, water bottle, food bowl, nesting nook, and interior play tubes—for a complete habitat solution.

**Effortless Assembly:**
- No tools required for assembly, which means you'll have your hamster's new home ready in no time.

**Peace of Mind Warranty:**
- Enjoy a 1-year Manufacturer's Warranty, ensuring that your investment is protected against any defects or issues.

**Experience the Perfect Blend of Comfort and Fun!**
The Awesome Arcade Hamster Home is designed to cater to your hamster's active lifestyle while ensuring they have a cozy and secure place to rest. Its white color seamlessly integrates into any decor, and the thoughtful features promise to keep your hamster engaged day after day. Give your pet the gift of an exciting and stimulating environment with this top-of-the-line hamster cage from MidWest Homes for Pets.

Designed specifically for small pets, this cage offers a multi-level play space complete with an array of engaging accessories. Its deep base accommodates ample bedding to ensure a happy and clean environment. 

Access is a breeze thanks to a convenient top door, and the removable cover makes cleaning and pet interaction easy. The modern white color complements any home decor, while the modular design and standard play tube connectors allow for endless configuration and expansion, ensuring your pet never tires of their environment.

The included exercise wheel promotes health and vitality, the water bottle and food bowl cater to all your pet's dining needs, and the nesting nook provides a snug retreat. With interior play tubes for your hamster to scurry through, this cage truly is a pet paradise!

Easy to assemble without the need for tools, this cage is practical for pet owners of all experience levels. Plus, enjoy peace of mind with the 1-year Manufacturer's Warranty, ensuring your pet's home stands the test of time.
